A village of plenty and prosperity
ftbquests.chapter.village_quests.quest52: You approach a kindly villager standing by the &aParty Tree&r, his pipe smoke curling. He smiles warmly at you.

&b"Welcome, stranger! Ye’ve wandered into the Mossy Mounds. Want to fit in around here? The best way is to host a proper dinner party! Nothing brings folks together like good food shared beneath grassy rooftops."&r

&b"I’ll help ye plan the feast, but ye’ll need to handle the cooking. First things first: &6salads. Three of them, to be exact.&r&b A crisp garden salad, something with tart berries for sweetness, and a hearty acorn salad."&r
Host a party to meet the villagers!
ftbquests.chapter.village_quests.quest53: You return to the helpful villager, salads ready, and he beams at you, wiping a bit of flour from his apron.

&b"Those salads smell divine! The neighbors’ll be talkin’ about that fresh crunch for days,"&r he says, nodding approvingly. &b"But we can’t stop there. A dinner party needs a hearty main course to fill bellies and warm hearts."&r

He taps the side of his nose thoughtfully. &b"Let’s see… we’ll need &65 Stuffed Potatoes&r&b, &64 Smoked Ham&r&b, &62 Grilled Salmon&r&b, and &62 Fish Stew&r&b. Gather those, and we’ll have a spread fit for the finest of Mossy Mounds festivities."&r
Host a party to meet the villagers!
ftbquests.chapter.village_quests.quest54: With your main course sorted and the villager nodding with approval, you mention a final request. He lifts an eyebrow, a playful spark in his eye.

&b"Ah, but ye can’t have a proper dinner without dessert, now can ye?"&r He winks, leaning in as if sharing a secret. &b"Whip up &63 Sweet Berry Cheesecakes&r&b and &63 Chocolate Pies&r&b, and we’ll have the sweetest endin’ to a grand feast."&r
Host a party to meet the villagers!
ftbquests.chapter.village_quests.quest55: &6The party passes in a joyful whirl of laughter, music, and shared stories, and now you stand with the friendly villager beneath the soft glow of lanterns.&r

&b"Look at ’em all,"&r he says quietly, nodding toward the mossy mounds, &b"Comin’ to thank ye. See that line of villagers bearing baskets and bundles? Those are gifts, traveler—tokens of gratitude for bringing us together with such a splendid feast."&r
He smiles warmly. &b"You’ve shown true hospitality. Enjoy these offerings, for tonight the Mossy Mounds call ye one of their own."&r
Host a party to meet the villagers!
ftbquests.chapter.village_quests.quest56: A &6friendly villager&r ushers you through the door of their snug little home. They smile brightly and say, &b"Ah, a traveler! Perfect timing. I’ve been meaning to spruce up the place, maybe add some &estepping stones out front, a few proper stairs inside, and a handful of chairs&r&b for guests."&r
They tilt their head. &b"Think you can help? I’ve heard you’ve got a knack for carpentry. Bring me these items, and I’ll reward ye with something special to brighten your own abode."&r
ftbquests.chapter.village_quests.quest57: You return to the villager’s home.

&b"Those furnishings turned out splendidly,"&r he says, nodding appreciatively. &b"But there’s still a certain spark missing. I’m thinkin’ &2terrariums&r&b—tiny worlds beneath glass. Bring me a few varieties, with lush greens and bright blooms. Make this place feel more alive!"&r
He taps a crate beside him. &b"Do this for me, and I’ll give you something special. Handy little thing to keep your home&6 neat and tidy."&r&r
ftbquests.chapter.village_quests.quest58: You find the villager eyeing his home’s interior, a contented smile on his face.

&b"Ye’ve done well, my friend... but I’ve one last request. The floors could be comfier—a few &6fluffy carpets&r&b would do nicely. And I’d love some &6awnings&r &bover the windows to shade the afternoon sun."&r

He leans in, lowering his voice. &b"These awnings aren’t just cloth—oh no, you need fabric. Compact wool using a bit o’ machinery, press it down nice and tight, and ye’ll get that sturdy material perfect for outdoor coverings."&r He spreads his hands, smiling. &b"Do this final favor, and our little home here’ll be as &6warm and welcoming&r&b as any in the &aMossy Mounds.&b"&r
ftbquests.chapter.village_quests.quest59: As you enter the tavern, you see someone leaning against a doorframe with crossed arms.

She gestures at the party-goers, her voice low and edged: &b"Look at these people, so pleased to &5live and die&r&b in these &agrassy holes.&r I know there are &5monsters&r&b out there worth more than these dull stories. Fetch me a &6bestiary&r&b, full of claws and fangs and ancient threats. Bring it here, and maybe I’ll show you something this village would never dare dream of."&r
A Song of Scales \& Smoke I
In a corner of the barracks, a small shop is set up, with armor on an &bArmor Stand&r.

&b"So, you're the new recruit huh? Well, I guess recruit to be. &6You aren't allowed to perform Royal Guard duties until you've donned the armor, and of course you need to pay for it...&r&b Guess who the money goes to..."&r
&b"Noooooo, that definitely wasn't criticism of anyone, especially not our beloved &eKing&r&b. I'm definitely not upset that we had to PAY for our own uniforms."&r
&b"&6At least its pretty good quality goods.&b"&r
ftbquests.chapter.village_quests.quest60: Satisfied that you’ve brought the bestiary, she paces with a hungry gleam in her eye.

&b"So you’ve a taste for dangerous knowledge. Good. Out there lies a &6dragon’s skull.&r&b Bring it to me. I’ve got metal from some forge, rare beyond telling. With that skull and my metal, I can craft the Dragon Seeker, a staff that rings when dragons lurk nearby.&r"
She smirks, daring you to hesitate. &5"Enough cowering; it’s time to shake this valley awake."&r
A Song of Scales \& Smoke II
ftbquests.chapter.village_quests.quest61: With the Dragon Seeker in your hands, its hollow tone waiting to sing at the presence of scaled wings, she nods approvingly.
&b"This is it. With that staff, you can track a &4living dragon&r&b straight to its lair. Go and find its nesting ground. Bring me its egg, proof you’ve stood face-to-face with myth itself.&r"
Her gaze flicks back to the village. &6"Return with that egg, and we’ll rattle these hills with a story they’ll never forget."&r
A Song of Scales \& Smoke III
ftbquests.chapter.village_quests.quest62: When you return, dragon egg in hand, she regards you with a mixture of triumph and satisfaction. &b"Look at that! You’ve done what none of these &amoss-eaters&r&b dared even whisper. I’ll not forget that."&r

She steps aside, revealing a small alcove hidden behind her home’s curtain of vines. Within lie curious tools and gleaming scales of metal. &b"From this day on,"&r she says, &b"I’ll trade with you as an equal. Bring me dragon bones, and I’ll give you precious diamonds and sapphires in return. None of this trinket nonsense—&6true riches&r&b for those who’ve proven themselves."&r
As you hand over the banners, the &5Captain's&r face shifts ever so slightly. You catch a brief hint of surprise, but he quickly reverts back to his usual stoicism.
&b"Not bad. &6Buy your equipment&r&b in the barracks and be back here by tomorrow morning for your assignments. Perhaps you can be of use to us after all."&r
&b"Now, anywhere you go, as long as you wear this armor, you will be recognized. Bear it with pride and don't let us down."&r
As you walk through the Village, alarm bells start ringing out.
As you strike down the last of the Raiders, you hear the murmurs of the Villagers around you.
&b"&5Royal Guards&r&b? But we didn't have any?"&r
&9"Isn't that the Traveller that just came? Were they sent by the &eKing&r&9?"&r
&c"I can't believe we survived..."&r
&a"Sir Royal Guard!"&r
As you turn to look, a small child runs up to you, with a white flower in hand. Her mom frantically is trying to catch up to her.
&a"Thank you for saving us! Here, this is for you. I'm gonna become just like you when I grow up!"&r
Just as she hands you the flower, her mother catches up.
&b"I'm so sorry about my child. You know they are at that age. Thank you for saving us though. I... I didn't know you were a &5Royal Guard&r&b. Either way, sincerely, thank you."
&b"IT'S A &7RAID&r&b! EVERYONE GET INSIDE"&r
In the chaos, you hear a small voice,
&a"Mom, are the &5Royal Guards&r&b gonna save us?"&r
&b"I... Of course dear..."&r
&a"Yay! I want to watch them fight!"&r
&b"NO! Sorry, mommy didn't mean to yell. But we need to hide"&r
&a"But mom, if our village has &5Royal Guards&r&a, won't we be fine? I... I don't see the purple armor or the &eKing's insignia&r&a though? Oh I get it, they're just changing right?"&r
&b"Yeah..."&r
A tale of a heroic deed...
Defeat a Raid!
The Hero
Rumors of your accomplishments ring throughout the lands...
ftbquests.chapter.village_quests.title: Village Quests
info.endrem.black_eye: Found in the Pirate Village, Buried Treasure, and Shipwrecks.
info.endrem.lost_eye: Obtained through Bounty Board Quests with a Reputation of 15 or greater.
info.endrem.old_eye: Found in the Desert Labyrinth or dropped by the largest of Deathworms.
info.endrem.cursed_eye: Found in Bastions or rarely obtained through Piglin Bartering.
info.endrem.evil_eye: Traded from a Master level Cleric.
info.endrem.magical_eye: Created through combining magical essences in an Enchanting Apparatus.
info.endrem.undead_eye: Obtained through combining multiple undead essences in a Mixing Cauldron.
info.endrem.exotic_eye: Obtained through combining many exotic materials.
info.endrem.cryptic_eye: Very rarely obtained through FTB Quest rewards.
info.alexscaves.cave_codex: Use to unlock new chapters on the Cave Codex or combine with a Map to obtain a Cave Biome Map.
info.minecraft.iron_boots: Walk on any surface of a Scarlet Neodymium block with these
info.alexscaves.azure_magnet: Pulls up to 27 connected metallic blocks. Increase range with Azure Neodymium Ingots and decrease with Scarlet Neodymium Ingots.
info.alexscaves.scarlet_magnet: Pushs up to 27 connected metallic blocks. Increase range with Scarlet Neodymium Ingots and decrease with Azure Neodymium Ingots.
info.alexscaves.holocoder: Right click to bind to an entity. When placed into a Hologram Projector, displays bound entity or displays yourself if left unbound.
info.alexscaves.quarry_smasher: Set a field with four Magnetic Lights with a Magnetic Quarry one block outside between 2 of the Magnetic Lights (in the center). Place a Quarry Smasher within these bounds to activate. Will mine out any blocks underneath its designated area and the drops will be sent to the top of the Magnetic Quarry.
info.alexscaves.magnetic_light: Set a field with four Magnetic Lights with a Magnetic Quarry one block outside between 2 of the Magnetic Lights (in the center). Place a Quarry Smasher within these bounds to activate. Will mine out any blocks underneath its designated area and the drops will be sent to the top of the Magnetic Quarry.
info.alexscaves.quarry: Set a field with four Magnetic Lights with a Magnetic Quarry one block outside between 2 of the Magnetic Lights (in the center). Place a Quarry Smasher within these bounds to activate. Will mine out any blocks underneath its designated area and the drops will be sent to the top of the Magnetic Quarry.
info.alexscaves.tesla_bulb: Zaps anything that walks nearby. Explodes if broken or hit with a projectile.
info.alexscaves.galena_gauntlet: Use with a metal tool (including Netherite) in offhand. When used, launches tool or weapon 20 blocks in any direction.
info.alexscaves.resistor_shield: Switch polarities with Shift Right Click. Azure repels enemies, Scarlet pulls enemies closer.
info.alexscaves.heart_of_iron: Dropped when a Magnetron is killed.
info.alexscaves.scrap_metal: Converted to the rusty version when acid runs over it.
info.alexscaves.scrap_metal_plate: Converted to the rusty version when acid runs over it.
info.alexscaves.metal_rebar: Converted to the rusty version when acid runs over it.
info.alexscaves.metal_scaffolding: Converted to the rusty version when acid runs over it.
info.alexscaves.metal_barrel: Converted to the rusty version when acid runs over it.
info.alexscaves.limestone_spear: Deals low ranged and melee damage.
info.alexscaves.smooth_limestone: Apply Charcoal to Smooth Ancient Limestone to create Cave Paintings.
info.minecraft.charcoal: Apply Charcoal to Smooth Ancient Limestone to create Cave Paintings.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_subterranodon: Lured and bred with Cod. Tamed with Trilocaris Tails. Interact with while sneaking to command to Stay, Follow, or Wander. Interact with normally to ride.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_vallumraptor: Packs are led by an Elder (denoted by orange markings) and disperse if the Elder is killed. Can open doors and chests to steal any meats. If a Dinosaur Nugget is taken itll enter a relaxed state in which it can be fed a Serene Salad to tame. Breed tamed Vallumraptors with Dinosaur Nuggets. Babies will imprint on their parents owners.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_grottoceratops: Produce Fiddleheads which appear after they pick up and eat a Curly Fern. Bred with Tree Stars.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_tremorsaurus: Tame by hitting with a Primitive Club to stun, then by feeding Serene Salad afterwards. Takes several attempts. Can be ridden and made to roar (scares away all nearby mobs). Breed once tamed with Dinosaur Chops. Babies will imprint on their parents owners.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_relicheirus: Feed a Relicheirus some Primordial Soup to energize them and cause them to knock down any nearby trees. Breed Relicheirus with Tree Stars.
info.alexscaves.primordial_soup: Feed a Relicheirus some Primordial Soup to energize them and cause them to knock down any nearby trees. Breed Relicheirus with Tree Stars.
info.alexscaves.amber_monolith: Repopulates the nearby area depending on the natural spawn rates.
info.alexscaves.serene_salad: Removes the Stunned effect when consumed. Used to tame Tremorsaurus and Vallumraptors.
info.alexscaves.seething_stew: Grants Rage, which boost damage based on how little health is left.
info.alexscaves.primitive_club: Inflicts Stunned on targets. Renders them unable to move or melee attack.
info.alexscaves.primordial_helmet: When equipped, increases the health and saturation provided by consuming raw meat per each piece.
info.alexscaves.primordial_tunic: When equipped, increases the health and saturation provided by consuming raw meat per each piece.
info.alexscaves.primordial_pants: When equipped, increases the health and saturation provided by consuming raw meat per each piece.
info.alexscaves.ominous_catalyst: Throw into a volcano to summon the Luxtructosaurus.
info.alexscaves.tectonic_shard: Use on inhabitants of the Primordial Caves to change their skin into an Eruption style.
info.alexscaves.amber_curiosity: Rarely drops from mining Amber. Use on inhabitants of the Primordial Caves to change their skin into a Retro style.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_raycat: Tamed and bred with Radgills. Scares off Nucleepers and occasionally absorbs the Irradiated effect from their owner. Heals whenever absorbing Irradiated from nearby creatures.
info.alexscaves.acid_bucket: Convert scrap metal to the rusty version when acid runs over it. Rapidly corrodes armor when stood in. Produces mud when interacting with Water, Cobblestone when interacting with non-source blocks of Lava, and Radrock if Lava interacts with the source block of Acid.
info.alexscaves.unrefined_waste: Applies the Irradiated effect when walked over.
info.alexscaves.block_of_uranium: Applies the Irradiated effect when held.
info.alexscaves.uranium: Applies the Irradiated effect when held.
info.alexscaves.uranium_shard: Applies the Irradiated effect when held.
info.alexscaves.uranium_rod: Applies the Irradiated effect when held.
info.alexscaves.waste_drum: Applies the Irradiated effect when held. Creates a small explosion if disposed of in fire or lava.
info.alexscaves.charred_remnant: Applies the Irradiated effect when held.
info.alexscaves.radrock_uranium_ore: Applies the Irradiated effect when held.
info.alexscaves.sulfur: Grows the Sulfur Buds if an Acidic Radrock is placed above it.
info.alexscaves.sulfur_bud_small: Drops Sulfur. Grows the Sulfur Buds if an Acidic Radrock is placed above it.
info.alexscaves.sulfur_bud_medium: Drops Sulfur. Grows the Sulfur Buds if an Acidic Radrock is placed above it.
info.alexscaves.sulfur_bud_large: Drops Sulfur. Grows the Sulfur Buds if an Acidic Radrock is placed above it.
info.alexscaves.sulfur_cluster: Drops Sulfur. Grows the Sulfur Buds if an Acidic Radrock is placed above it.
info.alexscaves.acidic_radrock: Grows the Sulfur Buds if placed above it.
info.spelunkery.sulfur: Drops Sulfur. Grows the Sulfur Buds if an Acidic Radrock is placed above it.
info.alexscaves.radon_bottle: Obtained by using an empty bottle on a Geothermal Vent above an Acid source block.
info.alexscaves.disc_fragment_fusion: Obtained when a Tremorzilla kills a Nucleeper with a Nuclear Laser.
info.alexscaves.tremorzilla_egg: Hatch by setting off a Nuclear Explosion within 72 blocks of where the Egg is placed.
info.alexscaves.nuclear_bomb: Causes a massive explosion that affects all nearby mobs with Irradiation. Will hatch a Tremorzilla egg if is within 72 blocks of the explosion and triggers Nuclear Sirens in 255 blocks. Defuse with Shears.
info.alexscaves.nuclear_siren: Emits noise if a Nucleeper, Nuclear Bomb, or a Nuclear Furnace is going to explode or a Tremorzilla is going to fire its nuclear beam within 255 blocks.
info.alexscaves.hazmat_mask: Lowers the damage and effects of Irradiation and Acid.
info.alexscaves.hazmat_chestplate: Lowers the damage and effects of Irradiation and Acid.
info.alexscaves.hazmat_leggings: Lowers the damage and effects of Irradiation and Acid.
info.alexscaves.hazmat_boots: Lowers the damage and effects of Irradiation and Acid.
info.alexscaves.remote_detonator: Allows remote trigger of registered explosives.
info.alexscaves.raygun: Inflicted Irradiation. Requires Uranium Rods as fuel.
info.alexscaves.nuclear_furnace_componen: Create a Nuclear Furnace by placing 8 Nuclear Furnace Component blocks together. Similar to, but 5x faster than a Blast Furnace. Uses Uranium Rods as fuel, but produces Unrefined Waste as a byproduct. To prevent it from exploding, Metal Barrels need to be provided to store the Unrefined Waste.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_sea_pig: Sifts through Muck to look for anything edible. Feed Muck, Clay Balls, or Mud to cause Sea Pigs to produce Muck, Clay, Bone Meal, Sea Glass Shards, Pearls, and Marine Snow. Bucketable.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_hullbreaker: Will investigate and eventually attacks anything that emits light or glows.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_tripodfish: Bucketable. Found near the sea floor.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_lanternfish: Bucketable. May be found near the ocean surface near Abyssal Chasms.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_deep_one: Is initially wary of intruders. Attacking and damaging Deep Ones damages your Reputation and if low enough, will cause you to attacked on sight. Improve Reputation by offering them Pearls or Hearts of the Sea on Abyssal Altars to barter.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_deep_one_knigh: Is initially wary of intruders. Attacking and damaging Deep Ones damages your Reputation and if low enough, will cause you to attacked on sight. Improve Reputation by offering them Pearls or Hearts of the Sea on Abyssal Altars to barter.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_deep_one_mage: Is initially wary of intruders. Attacking and damaging Deep Ones damages your Reputation and if low enough, will cause you to attacked on sight. Improve Reputation by offering them Pearls or Hearts of the Sea on Abyssal Altars to barter.
info.alexscaves.mussel: Spreads to nearby blocks, esp. Wood. When broken, may drop Pearls.
info.alexscaves.pearl: May be dropped when breaking Mussels. Offer on an Abyssal Altar to appease the Deep Ones.
info.alexscaves.gazing_pearl: Changes color based on the Deep Ones modd towards outsiders. Obtained through Deep One Bartering (offer Pearls or Hearts of the Sea on an Abyssal Altar).
info.alexscaves.sea_glass_shards: Rarely dropped by breaking Muck, higher chance with Fortune. Obtained through Deep One Bartering or through feeding Sea Pigs Muck, Mud, or Clay Balls.
info.alexscaves.marine_snow: Use on Dead Coral to bring them back to life. Can also grow Sponges and other kinds of sea life. May be dropped by Sea Pigs when fed Mud, Muck, or Clay Balls.
info.alexscaves.ortholance: Hold down Right-click to charge a charge attack that leaves waves in its wake. May be obtained through Deep One Knight Bartering (offering Pearls or Hearts of the Sea on an Abysssal Altar).
info.alexscaves.magic_conch: Use to summon multiple Deep Ones to aid you in combat. Only stick around for a short period. May be obtained through Deep One Knight Bartering (offering Pearls or Hearts of the Sea on an Abysssal Altar).
info.alexscaves.sea_staff: Right-click to send out water attacks that arc toward nearby mobs. May be obtained through Deep One Mage Bartering (offering Pearls or Hearts of the Sea on an Abysssal Altar).
info.alexscaves.depth_charge: Can be thrown. Creates an explosion that destroys blocks, even under water.
info.alexscaves.floater: When used, quickly returns you to the water surface.
info.alexscaves.diving_boots: Grants faster walking speed on Muck.
info.alexscaves.drain: Moves fluids from an upward space downwards, as long as there is space for them.
info.alexscaves.submarine: Creating a Submarine by surrounding an Enigmatic Engine with 20 Copper Blocks and 6 Depth Glass to mark the front. Repaired the Submarine with Copper Ingots and remove oxidation with an Axe.
info.alexscaves.enigmatic_engine: Creating a Submarine by surrounding an Enigmatic Engine with 20 Copper Blocks and 6 Depth Glass to mark the front. Repaired the Submarine with Copper Ingots and remove oxidation with an Axe.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_sweetish_fish: Bucketable in Buckets of Purple Soda.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_candicorn: Tamed with Caramel Apples. Bred with Candy Canes.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_gum_worm: Call nearby Gum Worms with a Gobthumper and ride them with two Candy Cane Hooks.
info.alexscaves.gobthumper: Call nearby Gum Worms with a Gobthumper and ride them with two Candy Cane Hooks.
info.alexscaves.candy_cane_hook: Call nearby Gum Worms with a Gobthumper and ride them with two Candy Cane Hooks.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_gummy_bear: Feed a Potion to a Gummy Bear to cause it to hibernate. Once it reawakens, it will find a nearby Licoroot to scratch its back on, shaking off Jelly Beans in the process.
info.alexscaves.jelly_bean: Feed a Potion to a Gum Bear to cause it to hibernate. Once it reawakens, it will find a nearby Licoroot to scratch its back on, shaking off Jelly Beans in the process.
info.alexscaves.licoroot: Feed a Potion to a Gum Bear to cause it to hibernate. Once it reawakens, it will find a nearby Licoroot to scratch its back on, shaking off Jelly Beans in the process.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_gingerbread_ma: Gingerbread men steals candies from your inventory. Upon stealing nine pieces and storing them in a Gingerbarrel, they will create a piece of Gingerbread Armor. The weaker the armor gets, the higher the speed boost.
info.alexscaves.gingerbarrel: Gingerbread men steals candies from your inventory. Upon stealing nine pieces and storing them in a Gingerbarrel, they will create a piece of Gingerbread Armor. The weaker the armor gets, the higher the speed boost.
info.alexscaves.gingerbread_helmet: Gingerbread men steals candies from your inventory. Upon stealing nine pieces and storing them in a Gingerbarrel, they will create a piece of Gingerbread Armor. The weaker the armor gets, the higher the speed boost.
info.alexscaves.gingerbread_chestplate: Gingerbread men steals candies from your inventory. Upon stealing nine pieces and storing them in a Gingerbarrel, they will create a piece of Gingerbread Armor. The weaker the armor gets, the higher the speed boost.
info.alexscaves.gingerbread_leggings: Gingerbread men steals candies from your inventory. Upon stealing nine pieces and storing them in a Gingerbarrel, they will create a piece of Gingerbread Armor. The weaker the armor gets, the higher the speed boost.
info.alexscaves.gingerbread_boots: Gingerbread men steals candies from your inventory. Upon stealing nine pieces and storing them in a Gingerbarrel, they will create a piece of Gingerbread Armor. The weaker the armor gets, the higher the speed boost.
info.alexscaves.sundrop: Illuminates the nearby area and sometimes sends out rainbows of light.
info.alexscaves.vanilla_ice_cream_scoop: Can be thrown. Upon hitting a target, removes any potion effects.
info.alexscaves.chocolate_ice_cream_scoo: Can be thrown. Upon hitting a target, removes any potion effects.
info.alexscaves.sweetberry_ice_cream_sco: Can be thrown. Upon hitting a target, removes any potion effects.
info.alexscaves.hot_chocolate_bottle: Staves off the effects of not sleeping and prevents Phantoms from spawning when drank.
info.alexscaves.sugar_staff: Right-click to summon a ring of circling peppermints to damage enemies. Shift Right-Click to place a temporary ward underfoot which damages enemies.
info.alexscaves.frostmint: Frostmint reacts upon coming in contact with Purple Soda.
info.alexscaves.purple_soda_bottle: Frostmint reacts upon coming in contact with Purple Soda.
info.alexscaves.purple_soda_bucket: Frostmint reacts upon coming in contact with Purple Soda.
info.alexscaves.rainbounce_boots: Prevents fall damage and causes a bouncing effect.
info.alexscaves.gumball_pile: Shot Gums can use Gumball Piles as ammo, loading up to four shots at once.
info.alexscaves.shot_gum: Shot Gums can use Gumball Piles as ammo, loading up to four shots at once.
info.alexscaves.confection_oven: Spawns Gingerbread Men when powered by redstone, color varying by the type of Rock Candy placed under it. Each will attack anything that is not a Gingerbread Man of the same color and will deposit any drops into nearby Gingerbarrels.
info.alexscaves.sack_of_sating: Can be fed food from your inventory. Will attempt to feed you upon sensing you have decreased hunger.
info.alexscaves.conversion_crucible: When given a Biome Treat, the Conversion Crucible will slowly turn the nearby space into the biome of the Treat. Set the Treats biome by eating it in the biome of your choosing.
info.alexscaves.biome_treat: When given a Biome Treat, the Conversion Crucible will slowly turn the nearby space into the biome of the Treat. Set the Treats biome by eating it in the biome of your choosing.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_gloomoth: Passive. Attracted to light. When used as a sacrifice during a Underzealot Ritual, results in a Watcher.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_underzealot: Breaks light sources. Performs Rituals, sacrificing certain mobs to spawn others.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_watcher: Possesses the creature its attacking, preventing them from moving and forcing them to view the world through their view. Spawns when Underzealots sacrifice Gloomoths during their Rituals.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_vesper: Blocking their attacks with a Shield temporarily ground them. When sacrificed during an Underzealot Ritual, spawns a Forsaken, a very powerful monster.
info.alexscaves.spawn_egg_forsaken: Heals as long as it is not in direct light. Spawned when Underzealots sacrifice Vespers during their Rituals.
info.alexscaves.moth_dust: Can be thrown and will cause any mob hit to be moth scented, making it a target for attack by any Forlorn Hollows creatures.
info.alexscaves.moth_ball: Can be placed. Keeps Gloomoths away from light sources.
info.alexscaves.totem_of_possession: Bind to a target by hitting them. Right click to control where the bound creature goes and what it will attack. The possessed target needs to remain in sight.
info.alexscaves.beholder: Bind an Occult Gem. Use the Occult Gem to view through the Beholder.
info.alexscaves.burrowing_arrow: Pierces its targets and breaks up to 5 blocks.
info.alexscaves.dreadbow: Loads arrows more slowly, but when used, sends a volley of shadowy arrows.
info.alexscaves.hood_of_darkness: The Hood and Cloak of Darkness builds up Darkness overtime while worn. When the meter is full, press "G" to enter Shadow Mode, granting extremely fast flight for 10 seconds. Extend the length with a Darkened Apple
info.alexscaves.cloak_of_darkness: The Hood and Cloak of Darkness builds up Darkness overtime while worn. When the meter is full, press "G" to enter Shadow Mode, granting extremely fast flight for 10 seconds. Extend the length with a Darkened Apple
info.alexscaves.darkened_apple: The Hood and Cloak of Darkness builds up Darkness overtime while worn. When the meter is full, press "G" to enter Shadow Mode, granting extremely fast flight for 10 seconds. Extend the length with a Darkened Apple
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_grizzly_bear: Will become hostile upon being approached, unless recently sated with honey. Tamed by feeding it salmon when sated with honey.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_hummingbird: Bred with flowers and pollinates nearby flowers. Can be kept in an area with a hummingbird feeder.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_orca: Swimming with them grants the Orcas Might effect.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_gorilla: Become friendly if given Bananas, obtained by breaking Jungle Leaves.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_endergrade: Can be saddled and rid. Control with Chorus Fruit on a Stick
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_hammerhead_shar: Targets fish, squids, and any mobs below half health. May drop Shark Teeth upon attacking prey.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_warped_toad: Tamed and bred with Crimson Mosquito Larva. Healed with Maggots.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_moose: Chance to drop their Antlers every 7-10 days. Takes 3-5 days to regrow. Bred with dandelions.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_blobfish: Can be given a Slimeball to allow them to survive on land
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_seal: Bred with Lobster Tails. Feed 3 Fish to a basking seal to initiate a trade.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_shoebill: Fishes when left alone. Feed Crocodile Eggs to increase the "lure" effect and Terrapin Eggs to increase the "luck" effect.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_snow_leopard: Bred with Moose Ribs. Hunts prey mobs and when successful, more items are dropped, as if killed with a high level of Looting.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_spectre: Lure with Soul Hearts. Can use a Lead to take a trip across the End with it.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_crow: Damages crops, but can be scared away with a Carved Pumpkin. Tame by dropping Pumpkin Seeds for them to eat. Tamed crows will sit on Hay Blocks to regain health and can fly around the Hay Block to gather items. Will play items in containers with the same Item Frame. Deals extra damage to undead mobs.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_alligator_snapp: Moss grows overtime. Shear when mossy for a chance of getting Spiked Scute.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_mungus: Feed mushrooms they have to grow more. If slain with 5 or more mushrooms, they explode and convert the neighboring land into mushroom biome of the relative type. With more than 1 mushroom, they will fire beams at mushrooms of the same type to grow more or grow a mushroom over mycelium into giant mushrooms.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_mantis_shrimp: Tame with Tropical Fish, breed with Lobster Tails, heal with fish. Can be given a block by shift-right clicking and will seek out blocks of the same type to break.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_warped_mosco: Spawns when a Crimson Mosquito feeds on a Mungus with Warped Fungi.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_straddler: Become friendly if given Bananas, obtained by breaking Jungle Leaves.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_stradpole: Can be bucketted. Survives in water or lava. Feed a Crimson Mosquito Larva to cause them to grow into an adult.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_emu: Bred with Wheat. Good at dodging arrows, and Emu Feathers can be used to make leggings that grant a chance to avoid projectile damage.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_platypus: Bred with Lobster Tails. Can be bucketed. Tempted with Redstone and can be fed Redstone to make them dig through Clay to find Clay Balls and Maggots. Feeding Redstone Blocks increases the number of items dug up.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_tasmanian_devil: Fed Rotten Flesh to cause them to howl and scare away hostile mobs. Breed with meat.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_kangaroo: Tame with Carrots and bred with Grass. Shift-right click to access their inventory. Can be give swords, armor, and any non-meat food, used to heal themselves.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_cachalot_whale: Hunts Squid and may drop teeth in the process. May be beached during Thunderstorms and if pushed back in, rewards savior with Ambergris.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_leafcutter_ant: Harvests leaves with a chance to create a new Anthill every 5 leaves, if a queen is still present. Stomp on the hive to find the Queen. Pacify with Gongylidia.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_enderiophage: Created by placing an Eye of Ender into a Capsid placed above an End Rod. Afflicts Ender Flu, which can be removed by Milk or Chorus Fruit. Hostile to Enderman and Endergrades. When Ender Flus timer runs out, many smaller Enderiophages burst out and the victim takes heavy damage.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_bald_eagle: Lured and tamed with Fish Oil. Heal with Fish, tame with Rotten Flesh. Pick up with Falconry Gloves and punch to launch at enemies. Can be used for scouting if given a Falconry Hood.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_tiger: Grarnts Tigers Blessing if fed Chicken or Porkchops. Lets you approach Tigers without being attacked. Tigers will also aid you if you are attacked. Bred with Acacia Blossoms.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_tarantula_hawk: Tame with Spider Eyes, bred with Fermented Spider Eyes (needs nearby Spiders to paralyze), heal with Flowers.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_void_worm: Baited by tossing a Mysterious Worm into the Ends Void.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_frilled_shark: Afflicts Exsanguination (quickly drains health). May drop its teeth upon attacking Squid.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_mimic_octopus: Tamed with Lobster Tails if not camouflaged, bred with Tropical Fish. Attacked by Mantis Shrimp and Sharks. If on land, give Slimeballs every few days to avoid drying out. Give an Ink Sac to cause it to change form. Give it Prismarine to make it mimic a Guardian or a Pufferfish to mimic a Pufferfish or Gunpowder to mimic a Creeper. Give 5-8 Mimicream to let them use the abilities of what they mimic.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_seagull: Bred with Cod. Steals food every one to three minutes. If holding a Buried Treasure Map and have tossed a Lobster tail onto the ground, the Seagull that eats it will sit directly above the buried treasure.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_froststalker: Bred with Porkchops while wearing a Froststalker Helmet.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_tusklin: Can be saddled and ridden for a short time before being bucked off. Can be equiped with Ancient Hogshoes. Pacify with Brown Mushrooms, breed with Red Mushrooms. Young Tusklins can dig up Brown Mushrooms from the dirt.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_laviathan: Laviathans can be ridden with Straddlite Saddle and controlled with Straddlite Tack. Allows up to four passengers. Solidifies into a stronger Obsidian form when in water. Breed with Crimson Mosquito Larva and healed with Magma Cream.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_cosmaw: Tamed and bred with Cosmic Cod, healed with Chorus Fruit. Will save owners who fall off the edge of an End island
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_toucan: Bred with Eggs. Feed an Apple for a chance to place an Oak Sapling, feed a Banana for a chance to plant a Jungle Sapling. Feed a Golden Apple to make them plant saplings at a faster rate. Feed an Enchanted Golden Apple to let Toucans plant saplings without need to be fed fruit.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_maned_wolf: Bred with the meat of Rabbits or Chicken. When fed Apples, releases a smell that attracts other animals to the area and increases the production of fungus in nearby Leafcutter Anthills.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_anaconda: Preys on anything small enough. After several large meals, sheds it skin. Pacified and bred with Chicken.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_anteater: Preys on Leafcutter Ants. When attacking an anthill, may undercover dirt, rooted dirt, pupae, tubers, fungus, and other items. Bred with Leafcutter Ant Pupae.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_flutter: Bucketable (flowerpot while sneaking if tamed). Tamed with 4-6 flowers that are different than each other. Can be equipped with a flower pot to give them armor. When near azalea bushes or leaves, chance for them to bloom. Healed with flowers, bred with bonemeal.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_gelada_monkey: Feed wheat to entice them to destroy most grass in an area. Bred with dead bushes.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_jerboa: Found only in desert biomes at night. Hunted by rattlesnakes, foxes, and cats. Begs for seeds and if give, grants Fleet-Footed (speed boost when running and jumping at the same time). Wont disappear if fed Seeds or Maggots. Bred with Maggots or small insects.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_terrapin: Bucketable. If jumped on, will recede into its shell. If jumped on again, will spin in the direction of the jumper. Bred with Sea Grass. Baby turtles may mutate to have a random color.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_cosmic_cod: Bucketable (empty bucket). Damaged by water. If attacked, will attempt to teleport away. Prey of Cosmaws and used to tame them.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_bunfungus: Created by feeding a rabbit several Mungal spores, dropped by Mungi. Attacks any monster in their sight. Make completely passive (from neutral) by giving a carrot. Carrots also grants regeneration and strength.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_bison: Attack any person who comes to near. Shear to obtain Bison Fur. Sheared Bison need to eat plenty of grass to regain their shaggy coat. Adults clear any snow layers in their area. Bred with wheat. Remove snow in their coat with a shovel or add snow with snow.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_giant_squid: Hostile towards Guardians and Fish. If attacked by Cachalot Whales, may lose a Tentacles. Depressurized if under less than 10 blocks of water. When struck by lightning, may become a unique blue Giant Squid.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_devils_hole_pup: Only spawn in underground aquifers within a single chunk. Eats muck off submerged moss blocks and may dislodge slime balls. May reproduce with other pupfish after feeding on moss. Bucketable.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_catfish: Small and medium Catfish vacuum up any items they see. Small Catfish store up to three stacks of items, Medium Catfish can store up to nine. Large Catfish (only found in Swamps) may swallow any mob shorter than a block. Regurgitate any item or mob eaten if injured or if they encounter a Sea Pickle. Lured with Sea Lanterns. Bucketable.
info.alexsmobs.small_catfish_bucket: Small and medium Catfish vacuum up any items they see. Small Catfish store up to three stacks of items, Medium Catfish can store up to nine. Large Catfish (only found in Swamps) may swallow any mob shorter than a block. Regurgitate any item or mob eaten if injured or if they encounter a Sea Pickle. Lured with Sea Lanterns. Bucketable.
info.alexsmobs.medium_catfish_bucket: Small and medium Catfish vacuum up any items they see. Small Catfish store up to three stacks of items, Medium Catfish can store up to nine. Large Catfish (only found in Swamps) may swallow any mob shorter than a block. Regurgitate any item or mob eaten if injured or if they encounter a Sea Pickle. Lured with Sea Lanterns. Bucketable.
info.alexsmobs.large_catfish_bucket: Small and medium Catfish vacuum up any items they see. Small Catfish store up to three stacks of items, Medium Catfish can store up to nine. Large Catfish (only found in Swamps) may swallow any mob shorter than a block. Regurgitate any item or mob eaten if injured or if they encounter a Sea Pickle. Lured with Sea Lanterns. Bucketable.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_rain_frog: Feed Maggots to breed. Will eat any small insect items they can find. Use a shovel on a burrowing frog to disturb it and prevent it from disappearing. May brings rain if pleased. Known to enjoy Music Discs.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_potoo: If in a location where it is dark enough for monsters to spawn, it will constantly shriek and its pupil will take up most of its eye. Handle and move with a Falconry Glove. Bred with Maggots.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_mudskipper: Tamed with Lobster Tails. Spits mud to defend its owner, inflicting slowness. Bred with Insect Larva or Lobster Tails.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_rhinoceros: Attacks anyone who gets too close. Will seek out and attack Pillagers on sight. Pacify with Wheat. If a potion is used on a Rhinoceros, it will be applied to its horn and any creature attacked will be inflicted with the potion effect. Lasts for 15-20 attacks. Befriended Rhinoceros aid anyone who has fed them wheat and will roam nearby villages for safety. Bred with Tall Grass or Dead Bushes.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_sugar_glider: Tamed with Sweet Berries. Place on ones head by sneak right-clicking and if on ones head, will grant Slow Falling. Tamed Sugar Gliders will forage through leaf blocks for items. Bred with Honeycombs.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_farseer: Found near the World Border. Attacks pierce through armor and enchantments.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_skreecher: Makes a loud noise when detecting intruders.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_underminer: Only damaged with Magic (ie. splash potions). Mines blocks which may have ore behind them. If dropped a specific ore block, will seek out similar ores in the surrounding area.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_skunk: If chased or damaged, will release a noxious spray, inflicting nausea. The spray lingers and can be bottled. If inflicted with a potion effect while spraying, will create a lingering cloud of the effect nearby. Bred with Sweet Berries.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_banana_slug: May drop some slime while moving around the world. Bred with Brown Mushrooms.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_blue_jay: Loves Glow Berries. If fed, will be charmed for a while, following the feeder through the world. If a Racoon is fed a Glow Berry during this time, they will be bonded and if the Racoon starts a fight, the Blue Jay will assist. Feed another Glow Berry to convince it to leave its friend. If fed a seed, will chirp a short song that reveals nearby monsters. Bred with Maggots or other insect larvae.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_caiman: Bred with Catfish and will lay eggs. When hatching, will imprint on the nearest entity. Will defend their owner by grabbing targets and holding them still.
info.alexsmobs.spawn_egg_triops: Breed by tossing a carrot. Bucketable.
info.alexsmobs.banana_peel: Obtained by giving Capuchin Monkeys Bananas. Can be placed on the ground.
info.alexsmobs.fedora: Rarely obtained by granting Platypuses Redstone Blocks and allowing them to dig in Clay. Can be given to Playtpuses.
info.alexsmobs.cachalot_whale_tooth: Obtained when Cachalot Whales attack Squid, Glow Squid, Mimic Octopuses, and Giant Squids.
info.alexsmobs.shrimp_fried_rice: Obtained by giving a tamed Mantis Shrimp Rice, setting to Break Block mode, and then placing a Furnace or Smoker.
info.alexsmobs.crocodile_scute: Obtained when Baby Crocodiles grow into adults.
info.alexsmobs.blood_sac: Adds Blood to the Hephaestus Forge.
info.alexsmobs.ancient_dart: Can be given to tamed Capuchin Monkeys to throw.
info.alexsmobs.mosquito_larva: Can be used to grow stradpoles into straddlers.
info.alexsmobs.shark_tooth: May be dropped by Hammerhead Sharks preying on fish, squids, and mobs below half health.
info.alexsmobs.shark_tooth_arrow: Travels better underwater and deals more damage to aquatic creatures.
info.alexsmobs.moose_antler: May be dropped by Mooses every 7-10 days.
info.alexsmobs.mimicream: Surround an Tool with 8 copies to make a copy with 0 durability. Apply 5-8 to a Mimic Octopus to allow them to use the abilities of what they mimic.
info.alexsmobs.fish_oil: Grants Oiled. Lets you float in water and in rain.
info.alexsmobs.cockroach_ootheca: Produced by Cockroachs. Throw to hatch.
info.alexsmobs.acacia_blossom: Rarely dropped by breaking Acacia Leaves. Obtained by Sugar Glider foraging on Acacia Leaves.
info.alexsmobs.spiked_scute: May be dropped when shearing mossy snapping alligators.
info.alexsmobs.gustmaker: When activated with Redstone, sends a gust of wind that moves mobs and items,.
info.alexsmobs.straddleboard: Dyable. Can be used to travel across lava, but may snap and throw you off.
info.alexsmobs.ambergris: Gifted when saving beached Cachalot Whales. Smelts up to 64 items.
info.alexsmobs.straddle_saddle: Laviathans can be ridden with Straddlite Saddle and controlled with Straddlite Tack. Allows up to four passengers. Solidifies into a stronger Obsidian form when in water. Breed with Crimson Mosquito Larva and healed with Magma Cream.
info.alexsmobs.straddle_helmet: Laviathans can be ridden with Straddlite Saddle and controlled with Straddlite Tack. Allows up to four passengers. Solidifies into a stronger Obsidian form when in water. Breed with Crimson Mosquito Larva and healed with Magma Cream.
info.alexsmobs.mungal_spores: Rarely shed by Mungi. Tempts Rabbits and when used on Rabbits, transforms them into Mungi. Used to breed Mungi.
info.alexsmobs.squid_grapple: Acts as a grapple hook. Can shoot up to four tentacles. Sneak to detach.
info.alexsmobs.lost_tentacle: Dropped by Giant Squid when slain by Cachalot Whales.
info.alexsmobs.pupfish_locator: Locates chunks containing Devils Hole Pupfish.
info.alexsmobs.leafcutter_ant_pupa: Obtained rarely by breaking Ant Chamber blocks. Use on dirt to create a new colony.
info.alexsmobs.gongylidia: High saturation food. Obtained by interacting with chamber blocks, but upsets Ants unless shroomlight is present.
info.alexsmobs.enderiophage_rocket: Can be used in place of Rockets for Elytra flying
info.alexsmobs.capsid: Can store up to 64 of an item. Sends items upwards if there is another Capsid or Storage block above it.
info.alexsmobs.falconry_glove: Used to pick up Bald Eagles and Potoos.
info.alexsmobs.mysterious_worm: It yearns for the Void of the End.
info.alexsmobs.dimensional_carver: Tears open a portal back to your spawn.
info.alexsmobs.shattered_dimensional_car: Creates a portal that leads one million blocks in any direction.
info.alexsmobs.serrated_shark_tooth: Dropped when Frilled Sharks attack Squid.
info.alexsmobs.shield_of_the_deep: Afflicts attackers with Exsanguination (quickly drains health).
info.alexsmobs.pigshoes: Obtained by Piglin Bartering. Enchantable. Equip to Tusklins.
info.alexsmobs.shed_snake_skin: Shed by Anacondas after fed several large meals.
info.alexsmobs.vine_lasso: Can lead hostile mobs but cant be attached to fence posts.
info.alexsmobs.rainbow_jelly: Apply to mobs to grant a rainbow coloration. Eat to apply effect to yourself. Remove with a Sponge.
info.alexsmobs.sculk_boomer: When activated with a Sculk Sensor, releases a loud sound pulse that damages nearby mobs. Disable with a redstone signal.
info.alexsmobs.transmutation_table: Changes one item to one of three for an small EXP cost. Keeps a memory of previous transmutations and may offer them.
info.alexsmobs.ghostly_pickaxe: Dropped by Underminers. Stores up to 9 stacks of blocks if your inventory is full. Upon a slot reopening, will populate that spot with a stored block.
info.alexsmobs.tendon_whip: Reaches from over 8 blocks away and hits up to three nearby mobs.
info.alexsmobs.unsettling_kimono: Increases the wearers placement abilities by 2 blocks and makes most undead monsters neutral.
info.alexsmobs.stink_bottle: Obtained by using a Glass Bottle on lingering stink left by Skunks. Used as ammo in Stink Rays
info.alexsmobs.stink_ray: Causes neutral and hostile mobs to attack anything sprayed with this. Passive mobs flee from any mob sprayed with this.
info.alexsmobs.banana_slug_slime_block: Turns nearby water into Crystallized Banana Slug Mucus.
info.alexsmobs.mosquito_repellent_stew: Grants the Mosquito Repellent effect, which causes Crimson Mosquitos to flee.
info.alexsmobs.hummingbird_feeder: Filled with either Water Bottles or Sugar. Attracts nearby Hummingbirds and improves their pollination effects.
info.alexsmobs.caiman_egg: Obtained by breeding Caimans with Raw Catfish. Stacks up to 4 times. Baby Caimans will imprint on the nearest entity.
info.alexsmobs.crocodile_egg: Obtained by breeding Crocodiles with Rotten Flesh. Stacks up to 4 times. Baby Crocodiles will imprint on the nearest entity.
info.alexsmobs.triops_eggs: Obtained by breeding Triops with Carrots.
info.berry_good.music_disc_fox: Sometimes found in the mouths of Foxes.
info.minecraft.sweet_berries: Convert to Sweet Berry Pips to plant.
info.minecraft.glow_berries: Convert to Glow Berry Pips to plant. Can be placed onto Silver Lattices.
info.biomemakeover.poltergeist: Randomly triggers Redstone interactive blocks up to 2 blocks away.
info.biomemakeover.peat: Increases how fast crops grow. Can be dried to create a very potent fuel source.
info.biomemakeover.lightning_bug_bottle: Obtained by using an Empty Bottle on a Lightning Bug.
info.biomemakeover.altar: Increases a random Enchant by 1 level, regardless of if it is at the capped or not, but Curses the item enhanced. Powered by Illunite Shards.
info.biomemakeover.cladded_stone: Can be used to create Stone Golems, similar to Iron Golems.
info.biomemakeover.lightning_bottle: When thrown, provides the same effects as if a mob had been struck by Lightning. Obtained by using a Bottle O Enchanting on a lightning bug.
info.biomemakeover.soul_embers: Obtained through Witch Haggling. Can be used in place of Blaze Powder.
info.biomemakeover.stunt_powder: Prevents baby mobs from growing up.
info.biomemakeover.enchanted_totem: When activated, instantly grants 1/2 your max HP, 25 seconds of Regeneration II, 60 seconds of Absorption IV, 100 seconds of Fire Resistance I and Resistance I. Removes all Negative Effects.
info.biomemakeover.cladded_boots: Allows for walking on Powdered Snow.

info.domesticationinnovation.collar_tag: Enchantable. Rename in an Anvil, place onto a pet by interacting with it, and get Collars back by swapping it with any other collar. View a pets enchants by sneaking and looking at them.
info.domesticationinnovation.feather_on_: When thrown, the closest pet will try to move to its feather to play with it. Useful for moving a pet onto its bed to set its respawn point.
info.domesticationinnovation.rotten_appl: Chance to form if an apple despawns on the ground. Feed to a tamed and saddled Horse to convert to a Zombie Horse.
info.domesticationinnovation.sinister_ca: Rarely found as loot in Woodland Mansions. Fed to Zombie Horses to turn into a Skeleton Horse. Can be fed to a tamed Rabbit to transorm it into a Killer Rabbit.
info.domesticationinnovation.deed_of_own: Purchased from the Animal Tamer Villager. Right Click on a pet you own to bind it to the Deed. If given to another player and they use it on the bound animal, the ownership passes to them.
info.domesticationinnovation.drum: Command groups of pets by interacting to change command modes. Automate by giving a redstone signal.
info.domesticationinnovation.wayward_lan: If pets are lost in their "follow" mode, they will eventually find their way to the closest Wayward Lantern to you.
info.dragonseeker.dragonseeker: Creates a tone, which is slightly higher when it detects a dragon within 150 blocks. It will also pick up on dead and tamed dragons!
info.dragonseeker.epic_dragonseeker: A more accurate Dragonseeker with higher range.
info.dragonseeker.legendary_dragonseeker: With even more accuracy and range, it does not detect dead or tamed dragons.
info.forbidden_arcanus.growing_edelwood: Use a corrupt soul on an oak sapling or dead bush.
info.forbidden_arcanus.spectral_eye_amul: Highlights all hostile and passive mobs nearby.
info.forbidden_arcanus.magical_farmland: Use Arcane Bone Meal on farmland to create. Doubles all output grown on it.
info.forbidden_arcanus.quantum_catcher: Right click to capture any mob inside.
info.forbidden_arcanus.arcane_bone_meal: Fully matures plants with one use. Use on farmland to create Magical Farmland.
info.forbidden_arcanus.yellow_orchid: Found in the flower forest biome.
info.forbidden_arcanus.darkstone: Found at the bottom of the world.
info.forbidden_arcanus.edelwood_bucket: Can hold multiple buckets of a fluid at once and even some entities. Lava will break it unless you enchant it with Permafrost.
info.forbidden_arcanus.dark_matter: If dropped on the ground with Corrupti dust creates a black hole that attracts items and turns experience into Xpetrified orbs.
info.forbidden_arcanus.edelwood_log: Found in the Dark Forest biome.
info.forbidden_arcanus.stellarite_piece: Found deep in the earth in Stella Arcanum. Be careful, the ore is known to explode.

info.forbidden_arcanus.draco_arcanus_sce: Launches an electric orb that strike enemies with lightning.
info.forbidden_arcanus.mystical_dagger: Slay mobs with this weapon while holding a test tube to gather blood.

info.forbidden_arcanus.terrastomp_prism: Use in a smithing table with a Item Modifier Template on Pickaxes, Shovels, or Axes to let them vien-mine in a 3x3 area.
info.forbidden_arcanus.sea_prism: Use in a smithing table with a Item Modifier Template on helmets to break blocks faster and regenerate while underwater.
info.forbidden_arcanus.whirlwind_prism: Right click to create whirlwinds that propel you up and give you slow falling.
info.forbidden_arcanus.hephaestus_forge: Ponder to see how to create. Use a gavel to activate rituals.
info.forbidden_arcanus.draco_arcanus_arr: Creates Dragon Breath AOE on impact.
info.forbidden_arcanus.artisan_relic: It is rumored to be found among the common folk of the land.
info.forbidden_arcanus.crimson_stone: It is rumored to be found in a fiery Sanctum.
info.forbidden_arcanus.elementarium: It is rumored the ancient Tinkers once possessed it.
info.forbidden_arcanus.crescent_moon: It is rumored it is found in a dark and magical tower.

info.friendsandfoes.totem_of_freezing: Upon reaching half-health, removes all status effects, slows nearby mobs and grants Speed II.
info.friendsandfoes.totem_of_illusion: Upon reaching 1/3 health, removes all status effects, summons Illusions and grants Invisibility.
info.friendsandfoes.copper_golem_spawn_e: Created by placing a Lightning Rod on a Carved Pumpkin on top of a Copper Block. Randomly presses Copper Buttons and oxidizes over time unless Waxed.
info.friendsandfoes.tuff_golem_spawn_egg: Created by placing a Carved Pumpkin on top of Wool on top of a Tuff Block. Can hold items. Doesnt move if Waxed.
info.friendsandfoes.glare_spawn_egg: Tame with Glow Berries. Flies to dark spots where monsters can spawn and shakes. Breed with Glow Berries.
info.friendsandfoes.mauler_spawn_egg: Feed by Right Clicking with an Enchanted item or book. Stores Exp. Recover by Right Clicking with an empty Glass Bottle. Drops all stored Exp on death.
info.galosphere.sterling_horse_armor: Can be equipped with a Banner.
info.galosphere.silver_bomb: Modify Silver Bombs with a Combustion Table. String increases fuse time, Slime increases bounciness, and Gunpowder increases explosive power.
info.galosphere.combustion_table: Modify Silver Bombs with a Combustion Table. String increases fuse time, Slime increases bounciness, and Gunpowder increases explosive power.
info.galosphere.silver_balance: Emits a differing amount of Redstone Signal based on the block placed on top.
info.galosphere.silver_lattice: Silver Lattices can have Glowberries placed onto them.
info.galosphere.glow_flare: Launch with Right Click to cover an area with Glow Ink Clumps which emit light. Emits more light underwater.
info.galosphere.glow_ink_clumps: Launch with Right Click to cover an area with Glow Ink Clumps which emit light. Emits more light underwater.
info.galosphere.spectre_flare: Grants temporary vision from where it lands.
info.galosphere.bottle_of_spectre: Right Click a Spectre with a Allurite Shard, then a Spyglass to bind the Spyglass to the Spectre. Breed with Lichen Shelfs to create Specterpillars, which burrow into Lichen to form Cordyceps.
info.galosphere.spectre_spawn_egg: Right Click a Spectre with a Allurite Shard, then a Spyglass to bind the Spyglass to the Spectre. Breed with Lichen Shelfs to create Specterpillars, which burrow into Lichen to form Cordyceps.
info.galosphere.specterpillar_spawn_egg: Right Click a Spectre with a Allurite Shard, then a Spyglass to bind the Spyglass to the Spectre. Breed with Lichen Shelfs to create Specterpillars, which burrow into Lichen to form Cordyceps.

info.galosphere.lichen_shelf: Right Click a Spectre with a Allurite Shard, then a Spyglass to bind the Spyglass to the Spectre. Breed with Lichen Shelfs to create Specterpillars, which burrow into Lichen to form Cordyceps.

info.galosphere.golden_lichen_cordyceps: Restores some Oxygen when eaten underwater. Golden Cordyceps restore more.
info.galosphere.allurite_block: Warped Anchors will redirect nearby Ender Pearl teleportation to itself while negating any damage. Uses up to 4x Allurite blocks as fuel.
info.galosphere.warped_anchor: Warped Anchors will redirect nearby Ender Pearl teleportation to itself while negate any damage. Uses up to 4x Allurite blocks as fuel.

info.galosphere.charged_lumiere_block: Charge Lumiere Blocks with Lightning. Converts some blocks to others. Granite -> Red sand -> Sand. Cobblestone -> Gravel.

info.minecraft.glowstone_dust: Use a Lumiere Shard on a Composter to make Glowstone Dust instead of Bonemeal.
info.galosphere.monstrometer: Charge with Lumiere Blocks. Activate with Right Click to reveal any nearby monsters in a 16 block radius (including under ground).

ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest1.des: &b初学者法术书&r是冒险者的绝佳工具。虽然它最初只包含基本的&d魔符&r，但随着你的解锁，你将能够将这些&b魔符&r组合起来，创造出一些非常有趣的&d法术&r。
- 按下 “&5C&r” 键来打开制作法术的菜单（包含&6法术制作菜单&r和&6新生魔艺的说明文档&r）。&e别忘了给你的新制作的法术命名哦！&r
- 按下 “&5V&r” 键来切换法术。
每个&d法术&r都需要一个&d形态魔符&r（第一个&b魔符&r）和一个&d效果魔符&r。&d效果魔符&r可以通过&d增强魔符&r来强化（放置在效果魔符的左边）。
如需了解更多详情，请参阅每本&6法术书&r中包含的&b说明文档&r。
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest10.de: 通过附魔装置合成的&b法师之花种子&r，可以产出&b法师之花纤维&r，用于制作各种&d魔法护甲&r。
